member.name: M:Ektron.Cms.User.EkUser.SetAuthenticationCookie(Ektron.Cms.UserData)
member.summary: This method set the authentication cookie.
member.param: Returned value of the logInUser method.
member.remarks: First you must call the logInUser method to login the user.

member.param: Returned value of the logInUser method.

member.name: M:Ektron.Cms.User.EkUser.DeleteCookie
member.summary: Removes the cookie from the site.

member.name: M:Ektron.Cms.User.EkUser.GetUserCustomProperties(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns an array of custom properties for a given user's ID.
member.remarks: User login with administrator privileges are required to perform this operation.

member.name: M:Ektron.Cms.User.EkUser.ResetMembershipUserPassword(System.String,System.Int64)

member.remarks: User login is required to perform this operation.
